head.title: Apple's Chief Takes a Bow, And a Blow

hedline.hl1: Apple's Chief Takes a Bow, And a Blow

block.p: Surpassing even the most optimistic forecasts, Apple delivered an 88 percent increase in profit in its second quarter, sending its shares over $100 for the first time in after-hours trading.

But while investors were rewarding the chief executive, Steven P. Jobs, Silicon Valley was talking about a former chief financial officer's assertion that he cautioned Mr. Jobs in 2001 about the handling of stock options at Apple.
